languages.text: {n}Ваш удар вышибает еще один кусочек из Его эфирного тела, заставляет К'тан расточить еще частицу своего внимания на удержание собственной физической формы, и этого становится достаточно, чтобы сила Его начала втягиваться в Ярмо неостановимым потоком. Древнее чудовище испускает разъяренный вой — второй раз за вечность Его свободу попирают столь безжалостным образом.{/n}

{n}Your strike leaves another fracture on Its ethereal body, forcing the C'tan to expend one more grain of Its attention on maintaining Its physical form — and that is all it takes for Its power to start flowing into the Yoke in an endless stream. The ancient monstrosity lets out an enraged howl, for this is the second time in an eternity that Its freedom is being usurped in so forceful a fashion.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ваш удар вышибает еще один кусочек из Его эфирного тела, заставляет К'тан расточить еще частицу своего внимания на удержание собственной физической формы, и этого становится достаточно, чтобы сила Его начала втягиваться в Ярмо неостановимым потоком. Древнее чудовище испускает разъяренный вой — второй раз за вечность Его свободу попирают столь безжалостным образом.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Your strike blows another piece off His ethereal body, making C'Tan spread another particle of his attention to keep his physical body intact. It was enough for His power to start getting absorbed into the Yoke in an endless stream. The ancient monster lets out an enraged howl — this is the second time in eternity that His freedom is being violated in so merciless a fashion.{/n}

{n}Your strike blows another piece off His ethereal body, making C'Tan spread another particle of his attention to keep his physical body intact. It was enough for His power to start getting absorbed into the Yoke in an endless stream. The ancient monster lets out an enraged howl — this is the second time in eternity that His freedom is being violated in so merciless a fashion.{/n}

{n}Your strike blows another piece off His ethereal body, making the C'Tan spread another particle of his attention to keep his physical body intact. It was enough for His power to start getting absorbed into the Yoke in an endless stream. The ancient monster lets out an enraged howl: this is the second time in eternity that His freedom is being violated in so merciless a fashion.{/n}

{n}Your strike blows another piece off His ethereal body, making the C'Tan spread another particle of his attention to keep his physical body intact. It was enough for His power to start getting absorbed into the Yoke in an endless stream. The ancient monster lets out an enraged howl: this is the second time in eternity that His freedom is being violated in so merciless a fashion.{/n}

{n}Your strike leaves another fracture on Its ethereal body, forcing the C'tan to expend one more grain of Its attention on maintaining Its physical form — and that is all it takes for Its power to start flowing into the Yoke in an endless stream. The ancient monstrosity lets out an enraged howl, for this is the second time in an eternity that Its freedom is being usurped in so forceful a fashion.{/n}

{n}Your strike leaves another fracture on Its ethereal body, forcing the C'tan to expend one more grain of Its attention on maintaining Its physical form — and that is all it takes for Its power to start flowing into the Yoke in an endless stream. The ancient monstrosity lets out an enraged howl, for this is the second time in an eternity that Its freedom is being usurped in so forceful a fashion.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Votre coup arrache un autre morceau du corps éthéré du C'tan, ce qui l'oblige à déployer une autre particule de son attention pour préserver l'intégrité de son enveloppe physique. Cela suffit pour permettre au Joug de commencer à absorber son pouvoir dans un flux sans fin. Le monstre ancien pousse un hurlement de rage : c'est la deuxième fois depuis une éternité que sa liberté est violée de façon aussi impitoyable.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your strike leaves another fracture on Its ethereal body, forcing the C'tan to expend one more grain of Its attention on maintaining Its physical form — and that is all it takes for Its power to start flowing into the Yoke in an endless stream. The ancient monstrosity lets out an enraged howl, for this is the second time in an eternity that Its freedom is being usurped in so forceful a fashion.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Votre coup arrache un autre morceau du corps éthéré du C'tan, ce qui l'oblige à déployer une autre particule de son attention pour préserver l'intégrité de son enveloppe physique. Cela suffit pour permettre au Joug de commencer à absorber son pouvoir dans un flux sans fin. Le monstre ancien pousse un hurlement de rage : c'est la deuxième fois depuis une éternité que sa liberté est violée de façon aussi impitoyable.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tu golpe arranca otra parte de su cuerpo etéreo, obligando al C'tan a dedicar otra partícula de su atención a mantener su cuerpo físico intacto. Eso basta para que el Yugo empiece a absorber su poder en una corriente interminable. El monstruo ancestral profiere un aullido de furia: es la segunda vez en la eternidad que le arrebatan la libertad de una forma tan despiadada.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your strike leaves another fracture on Its ethereal body, forcing the C'tan to expend one more grain of Its attention on maintaining Its physical form — and that is all it takes for Its power to start flowing into the Yoke in an endless stream. The ancient monstrosity lets out an enraged howl, for this is the second time in an eternity that Its freedom is being usurped in so forceful a fashion.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tu golpe arranca otra parte de su cuerpo etéreo, haciendo que el C'Tan dedique otra partícula de su atención a mantener su cuerpo físico intacto. Eso basta para que el Yugo empiece a absorber su poder en una corriente interminable. El monstruo ancestral profiere un aullido de furia: es la segunda vez en la eternidad que le arrebatan la libertad de una forma tan despiadada.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你猛力一击，在祂的灵体上撕开了另一个大洞。星神碎片不得不分出另一部分意识进行修补，保证身体的完整性。在这样的干扰之下，祂的力量开始不断被圣枷吸收，变成了一条无穷无尽的能量之流。这只古老的怪物发出了愤怒的嚎叫。在祂永恒的存在之中，这是第二次，祂的自由被如此强硬地篡夺。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your strike leaves another fracture on Its ethereal body, forcing the C'tan to expend one more grain of Its attention on maintaining Its physical form — and that is all it takes for Its power to start flowing into the Yoke in an endless stream. The ancient monstrosity lets out an enraged howl, for this is the second time in an eternity that Its freedom is being usurped in so forceful a fashion.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你猛力一击，消灭了祂另一部分灵体。星神不得不将身体中的另一颗粒子散步出去，保证身体的完整性。在这样的干扰之下，祂的力量开始不断被圣枷吸收，变成了一条无穷无尽的能量之流。这只古老的怪物发出了愤怒的嚎叫。在祂永恒的存在之中，这是第二次，祂的自由被如此无情地侵犯。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Dein Hieb hinterlässt eine weitere Fraktur auf Seinem ewigen Körper und zwingt den C'tan, ein weiteres Körnchen Seiner Aufmerksamkeit dem Erhalt Seiner körperlichen Form zu widmen ... und das ist alles, was nötig war, um Seine Macht in einem endlosen Strom in das Joch fließen zu lassen. Die uralte Monstrosität stößt ein zorniges Heulen aus, denn zum zweite Mal seit einer Ewigkeit wird ihm seine Freiheit auf so brutale Weise genommen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your strike leaves another fracture on Its ethereal body, forcing the C'tan to expend one more grain of Its attention on maintaining Its physical form — and that is all it takes for Its power to start flowing into the Yoke in an endless stream. The ancient monstrosity lets out an enraged howl, for this is the second time in an eternity that Its freedom is being usurped in so forceful a fashion.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Durch deinen Schlag verliert sein ätherischer Körper ein weiteres Stück. Der C'tan muss ein weiteres Partikelchen seiner Aufmerksamkeit umleiten, um seinen physischen Körper intakt zu halten. Das reicht aus, um dafür zu sorgen, dass seine Kraft ab nun langsam und in einem endlosen Strom vom Joch absorbiert wird. Das uralte Monster stößt ein zorniges Heulen aus: Das ist schon das zweite Mal in der Ewigkeit, dass seine Freiheit auf so gnadenlose Weise eingeschränkt wird.{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたの一撃は、「それ」のエーテル体に新たな亀裂を生み出した。ク＝タンは物理的な肉体を維持するために、意識をさらに粒子へと拡散させることを余儀なくされる。そしてこれこそが、「それ」の力が果てしない流れとなり、ヨークに吸収される十分なきっかけとなった。古代の怪物は憤怒の雄叫びを上げる。己の自由がこれほど強引に剥奪されるのは、永遠において二度目のことだった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your strike leaves another fracture on Its ethereal body, forcing the C'tan to expend one more grain of Its attention on maintaining Its physical form — and that is all it takes for Its power to start flowing into the Yoke in an endless stream. The ancient monstrosity lets out an enraged howl, for this is the second time in an eternity that Its freedom is being usurped in so forceful a fashion.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたの一撃は、「それ」のエーテル体に新たな亀裂を生み出した。ク＝タンは物理的な肉体を維持するために、意識をさらに粒子へと拡散させることを余儀なくされる。そしてこれこそが、「それ」の力が果てしない流れとなり、ヨークに吸収される十分なきっかけとなった。古代の怪物は憤怒の雄叫びを上げる。己の自由がこれほど強引に剥奪されるのは、永遠において二度目のことだった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Saldırın, C'tan'ın bedeninde bir yara daha açıyor ve O'nu dikkatinin bir parçasını daha fiziksel formunu korumak için harcamaya zorluyor. Gücünün tamamını Boyunduruk'a akıtması için bu kadarı yeterli oluyor. Kadim canavar, öfkeyle uğulduyor zira ebediyet boyunca özgürlüğü ikinci kez böyle zorla elinden alınıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your strike leaves another fracture on Its ethereal body, forcing the C'tan to expend one more grain of Its attention on maintaining Its physical form — and that is all it takes for Its power to start flowing into the Yoke in an endless stream. The ancient monstrosity lets out an enraged howl, for this is the second time in an eternity that Its freedom is being usurped in so forceful a fashion.{/n}
